com.att.research.xacml.std.dom

Class DOMRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.dom.DOMRequest

  • public class DOMRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    DOMRequest is used to convert XML into Request objects. The Request objects returned by this class are instances of StdMutableRequest, not DOMRequest. Object instances are generated by loading a file, string, InputStream, or XML Node tree representing the Request.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    car

      • load

        public static Request load(java.io.File fileRequest)
                    throws DOMStructureException
        Read a file containing the XML description of a XACML Request and parse it into a Request Object. This is only used for testing. In normal operation a Request arrives through the RESTful interface and is processed using load(String xmlString).
        Parameters:
        fileRequest -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DOMStructureException

      • newInstance

        public static Request newInstance(org.w3c.dom.Node nodeRequest)
                           throws DOMStructureException
        Creates a new Request by parsing the given Node representing a XACML Request element.
        Parameters:
        nodeRequest - the Node representing the XACML Request element.
        Returns:
        a new StdMutableRequest parsed from the given Node
        Throws:
        DOMStructureException - if the conversion cannot be made
